oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mr. Smith Goes To Town - 1944-10-20 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC/WSM program Mr. Smith Goes To Town, originally broadcast October 20, 1944, part 1. Featuring announcer Irving Waugh with performers Beasley Smith and his Orchestra, Danny Ryan, the Rhythmeers, Betty (Alcyone Bate Beasley) and the Dixie Dons, and Sissy O'Brien.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Danny Ryan; Rhythmeers; Alcyone Bate Beasley; Dixie Dons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: NBC news (excerpt) -- Beau Brummell Ties commercial -- Opening statement (Irving Waugh) -- Theme -- [Unidentified song] (Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Irving Waugh introduces Danny Ryan -- Waiting (Danny Ryan, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra) -- Irving Waugh introduces the Rhythmeers -- On The Sunny Side Of The Street (Rhythmeers) -- Irving Waugh talks -- I'm Gonna Sit Right Down And Write Myself A Letter (Betty and the Dixie Dons) -- Irving Waugh talks -- Let Me Love You Tonight (Danny Ryan, Beasley Smith and his Orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Mr. Smith goes to town (Radio program); Waugh, Irving, 1912-2007; Smith, Beasley; Ryan, Danny (Vocalist); Beasley, Alcyone; Dixie Dons (Musical group)
